law.catch_line: In a local jurisdiction that requires a local license, the State license, while the State license is...

text.section: In a local jurisdiction that requires a local license, the State license, while the State license is in effect, serves only as a mechanism that helps a licensee in obtaining a local license under §§ 6-601 and 6-602 of this title.

If a county or municipal corporation does not require a local license, the State license, while the State license is in effect, authorizes the licensee to:
provide electrical services as a master electrician; or
be the representative of another person who engages in the business of providing electrical services.
